trigger_prototype.name: NVIDIA: {#NAME} - ECC double bits error detect
NVIDIA: {#NAME} - ECC single bits error detect

trigger.expression: {Template HW nvidia:script.nvidia.run3600.iregexp("error")}=1 or {Template HW nvidia:script.nvidia.run3600.regexp("Permission denied")}=1 or {Template HW nvidia:script.nvidia.run3600.regexp("^E:")}=1
trigger.name: NVIDIA: run 3600 ERROR message

trigger.expression: {Template HW nvidia:script.nvidia.run.iregexp("error")}=1 or {Template HW nvidia:script.nvidia.run.regexp("Permission denied")}=1 or {Template HW nvidia:script.nvidia.run.regexp("^E:")}=1
trigger.name: NVIDIA: run ERROR message
